# 10-Step Publish — Checklist (Template)

1. Freeze Santander JV dossier and publish CID
2. Bank confirmation request sent; track SLA and follow-ups
3. Spanish counsel memo engaged; add to vault dossier when received
4. HDG confirmation; order re-appraisal; select custodian; insurance quotes
5. Publish Bank Filings with four sections (clean totals)
6. Curate 3–5 flagship engines and one-pagers
7. Form IP Holdings LLC; assign repos/contracts/TLDs/CIDs/wallets
8. Engage boutique valuation memo; file in Corporate Treasury section
9. Draft: white-label license and IP-backed note term sheets
10. Prepare Facility I playbook; PoR runbook wired; investor factsheet
